lead_paragraph: The Saudi-led coalition fighting the Houthi rebel group was blamed for the attack that killed civilians at a market and a restaurant.

byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa reported from Sana, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo.
byline.original: By SHUAIB ALMOSAWA and KAREEM FAHIM

headline.print_headline: Dozens Killed by Airstrikes in Yemen
headline.main: Dozens Killed in Airstrikes on Market in Yemen

snippet: The Saudi-led coalition fighting the Houthi rebel group was blamed for the attack that killed civilians at a market and a restaurant.
abstract: Warplanes from Saudi-led military coalition bomb market in northern Yemen, killing dozens.
